text: Major General Syed Ghawas was a former governor of the Khyber-Pakhtunkhwa of Pakistan. He was appointed by Bhutto.Reminiscences of His Frontier Visits ==References== Category:Pakistani generals Category:Governors of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Living people Category:Baloch Regiment officers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Syed Ghawas
